description.en:
The course covers the following topics:
1. Test design
2. Test planning
3. Testing Techniques
4. Patten for Test-Driven Development 
5. Teamwork aspects of testing.
description.et: Aines kaetakse järgmised teemad: Testi disain; Testi planeerimine; Meeskonnatöö aspektid testimisel

objectives.en: This course aims at providing students with an opportunity to apply software testing concepts and techniques in a hands-on manner.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärk on anda tudengitele võimalus rakendada tarkvara testimise kontseptsioone ja tehnikaid praktilise tegevuse käigus.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon completion of this course, a student will:
1. Be aware of social aspects of software testing
2. Select and apply suitable testing techniques within a given software project
learning_outcomes.et: - valib ja rakendab konkreetsele tarkvaraprojektile sobivaid testimise tehnikaid.

learning_outcomes.en: 3. Apply effective techniques for conflict resolution in a software testing environment
learning_outcomes.et: - kasutab efektiivseid tehnikaid konfliktide lahendamiseks tarkvara testimise keskkonnas.

learning_outcomes.en: 4. Create and defend a software testing plan that takes into account multiple dimensions of software quality
learning_outcomes.et: - loob ja põhjendab tarkvara testimise plaani, mis võtab mitmekülgselt uurimisele tarkvara kvaliteedi.

independent_work.et:
JUnit Tutorial/Assignment
Selenium Tutorial/Assignment
 Jmeter Tutorial/Assignment

grade_preconditions.et:
•Assignment: 60 %
•Final report: 40 %
•Assessment: A: 90+, B: 80+, C: 70+, D: 60+, E: 50+, less than 50 = Fail

Points scale: 0-100 points

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)
